channel.title: OSS on Ryo Nakao
channel.description: Recent content in OSS on Ryo Nakao

item.title: Incredible reasons I make a recommendation to apply to GSoC despite never got accepted
item.description: Unfortunately, as mentioned earlier I was not able to get into Google Summer of Code 2019. Despite things never worked out as my expect, I do not despaired at all. Why? One of the potential reasons is that I was able to take the first big step toward wonderful OSS committer.
